title: 89/133/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 February 1989 amending the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in Portugal within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 February 1989
amending the boundaries of the less-favroured areas in Portugal within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(89/133/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: With effect from 11 June 1988, the list of less-favoured areas in Portugal contained in the Annexes to Directive 86/467/EEC is hereby amended in accordance with the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 February 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 273, 24. 9. 1986, p. 173.
(4) Basic adminitrative unit in Portugal.
